OCD.name: Meta Tags Link Domain Service Configuration
OCD.description: Modify domains of canonical and alternate links in the page's metadata

AD.name: Country Code Domain Key Mapping
AD.description: A mapping of excluded countries with their domain key (from ExternalizerImpl config). format: country:domain key, example: cn:eaton-meta-cn

AD.name: Fallback domain key
AD.description: Domain key to use when a country's domain key is not found in ExternalizerImpl config. Domain key must exist in ExternalizerImpl config.
